languages.text: "Что же... в таком случае прошу вас пройти к замку. Вся Тассера ожидала вашего прибытия, готовя лучшие яства и увеселения в вашу честь, поэтому, боюсь, будет не так просто избежать всеобщего внимания. Сопровождать вас будет придворная дама..."

traits.locale_text: "Вас понял, Ваше Сиятельство! В таком случае прошу вас пройти к замку. Вся Тессера ожидала вашего прибытия, готовя лучшие яства и увеселения в вашу честь, поэтому, боюсь, будет не так просто избежать всеобщего внимания. Ваше явление — настоящее чудо, о котором мы поведаем своим потомкам — а они своим. И да, к слову о юном поколении... Лидзи, подойди! Шустрее, шустрее!"

languages.text: "Well, in that case... please proceed to the castle. All of Thassera has been awaiting your arrival, busily preparing the finest dishes and entertainments in your honour, so I fear it may be challenging for you to avoid attention. Let us have a court lady accompany you..."
languages.original_text: "Что же... в таком случае прошу вас пройти к замку. Вся Тассера ожидала вашего прибытия, готовя лучшие яства и увеселения в вашу честь, поэтому, боюсь, будет не так просто избежать всеобщего внимания. Сопровождать вас будет придворная дама..."

traits.locale_text: "Well, in that case... Please proceed to the castle. All of Thassera has been awaiting your arrival, busily preparing the finest dishes and entertainments in your honour. So, I'm afraid it may be challenging for you to avoid attention. Let us have a court lady accompany you..."

"Well, in that case... Please proceed to the castle. All of Thassera has been awaiting your arrival, busily preparing the finest dishes and entertainments in your honour. So, I'm afraid it may be challenging for you to avoid attention. Let us have a court lady accompany you..."

"Well, in that case... please proceed to the castle. All of Thassera has been awaiting your arrival, busily preparing the finest dishes and entertainments in your honour, so I fear it may be challenging for you to avoid attention. Let us have a court lady accompany you..."

"Well, in that case... please proceed to the castle. All of Thassera has been awaiting your arrival, busily preparing the finest dishes and entertainments in your honour, so I fear it may be challenging for you to avoid attention. Let us have a court lady accompany you..."

"Well, in that case... please proceed to the castle. All of Thassera has been awaiting your arrival, busily preparing the finest dishes and entertainments in your honour, so I fear it may be challenging for you to avoid attention. Let us have a court lady accompany you..."

languages.text: “好吧，既然如此……请来城堡里吧。塔瑟拉所有人都在等待您的大驾，忙着为您准备最美味的佳肴与娱乐活动。您的到来，恐怕很难不会引起所有人的注意。我们还为您安排了一位侍女陪同……”
languages.original_text: "Well, in that case... please proceed to the castle. All of Thassera has been awaiting your arrival, busily preparing the finest dishes and entertainments in your honour, so I fear it may be challenging for you to avoid attention. Let us have a court lady accompany you..."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，既然如此……请来城堡里吧。塔瑟拉所有人都在等待您的大驾，忙着为您准备最美味的佳肴与娱乐活动。您的到来，恐怕很难不会引起所有人的注意。我们还为您安排了一位侍女陪同……”

languages.text: 「それでは…どうぞ城にお入りください。タッセーラ中があなた様のご到着を待ちわび、栄誉を称えるために極上の料理や娯楽を用意しておりましたゆえ、目立たずに行動なさるのは難しいかもしれません。宮廷の侍女を一人お付けいたしましょう…」
languages.original_text: "Well, in that case... please proceed to the castle. All of Thassera has been awaiting your arrival, busily preparing the finest dishes and entertainments in your honour, so I fear it may be challenging for you to avoid attention. Let us have a court lady accompany you..."

traits.locale_text: 「それでは…どうぞ城にお入りください。タッセーラ中があなた様のご到着を待ちわび、栄誉を称えるために極上の料理や娯楽を用意しておりましたゆえ、目立たずに行動なさるのは難しいかもしれません。宮廷の侍女を一人お付けいたしましょう…」

languages.text: «Bien, en ese caso... tenga la bondad de ir al castillo. Toda Thassera estaba esperando su llegada y preparando los mejores platos y entretenimientos en su honor; me temo que le resultará difícil pasar {mf|desapercibido|desapercibida}. Dispondré que una de nuestras doncellas les acompañe...».
languages.original_text: "Well, in that case... please proceed to the castle. All of Thassera has been awaiting your arrival, busily preparing the finest dishes and entertainments in your honour, so I fear it may be challenging for you to avoid attention. Let us have a court lady accompany you..."

traits.locale_text: «Bien, en ese caso... tenga la bondad de ir al castillo. Toda Thassera estaba esperando su llegada y preparando los mejores platos y entretenimientos en su honor; me temo que le resultará difícil pasar {mf|desapercibido|desapercibida}. Dispondré que una de nuestras doncellas les acompañe...».

languages.text: "O hâlde... Lütfen kaleye buyurun. Tüm Thassera; gelişinizi bekliyordu, şerefinize en iyi yemekleri ve eğlenceleri hazırlamakla meşguldü. Dolayısıyla dikkat çekmekten kaçınmanızın zor olacağını düşünüyorum. Saraylı bir leydimiz size eşlik etsin..."
languages.original_text: "Well, in that case... please proceed to the castle. All of Thassera has been awaiting your arrival, busily preparing the finest dishes and entertainments in your honour, so I fear it may be challenging for you to avoid attention. Let us have a court lady accompany you..."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde... Lütfen kaleye buyurun. Tüm Thassera; gelişinizi bekliyordu, şerefinize en iyi yemekleri ve eğlenceleri hazırlamakla meşguldü. Dolayısıyla dikkat çekmekten kaçınmanızın zor olacağını düşünüyorum. Saraylı bir leydimiz size eşlik etsin..."

languages.text: « Eh bien, dans ce cas... veuillez vous rendre au château. Tout Thassera attendait votre arrivée. Nous avons préparé les mets les plus raffinés et divers divertissements en votre honneur. Je crains donc que vous ayez du mal à éviter d'attirer l'attention. Permettez-nous de vous faire accompagner par une dame de la cour... »
languages.original_text: "Well, in that case... please proceed to the castle. All of Thassera has been awaiting your arrival, busily preparing the finest dishes and entertainments in your honour, so I fear it may be challenging for you to avoid attention. Let us have a court lady accompany you..."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, dans ce cas... veuillez vous rendre au château. Tout Thassera attendait votre arrivée. Nous avons préparé les mets les plus raffinés et divers divertissements en votre honneur. Je crains donc que vous ayez du mal à éviter d'attirer l'attention. Permettez-nous de vous faire accompagner par une dame de la cour... »

languages.text: "Also, wenn das so ist ... bitte folgt mir zum Schloss. Ganz Thassera hat Eure Ankunft erwartet und Euch zu Ehren die feinsten Gerichte und Unterhaltungen vorbereitet. Ich fürchte daher, es wird Euch schwerfallen, kein Aufsehen zu erregen. Lasst Euch wenigstens von einer Hofdame begleiten ..."
languages.original_text: "Well, in that case... please proceed to the castle. All of Thassera has been awaiting your arrival, busily preparing the finest dishes and entertainments in your honour, so I fear it may be challenging for you to avoid attention. Let us have a court lady accompany you..."

traits.locale_text: "Also, wenn das so ist ... bitte folgt mir zum Schloss. Ganz Thassera hat Eure Ankunft erwartet und Euch zu Ehren die feinsten Gerichte und Unterhaltungen vorbereitet. Ich fürchte daher, es wird Euch schwerfallen, kein Aufsehen zu erregen. Lasst Euch wenigstens von einer Hofdame begleiten ..."
